Please use the search or just look in the tutorial section next time, instead of making a whole new topic.

item.source: Changin what you are wearing wen you log in

item.title: Changin what you are wearing wen you log in
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

updated help version of the previous awesome help above:

go into player.java and search for any of these:

playerEquipment[playerHat] playerEquipment[playerCape] playerEquipment[playerAmulet] playerEquipment[playerChest] playerEquipment[playerShield] playerEquipment[playerLegs] playerEquipment[playerHands] playerEquipment[playerFeet] playerEquipment[playerRing] playerEquipment[playerArrows] playerEquipment[playerWeapon] then add an = plus the item id after to set what you want your players to have once they login for the first time.
again…this will never beat the above help…

example of setting an item at start:

playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151; //whip

Read full topic
item.source: Changin what you are wearing wen you log in
